title: Indulge in US$2000 Worth of Five-Star Spa Treatments, Bali
description: Whether you have a girls’ holiday, babymoon or romantic escape pencilled into your diary, you won’t be able to resist indulging in US$2,000 (AU$2,500) worth of five-star spa treatments at Alila Manggis, Bali. Enjoy five nights in paradise with almost unlimited massages, facials, body scrubs and manicures, plus yoga and tai chi classes, daily breakfasts, private return airport transfers healthy dining experiences and more.
offer_address: Desa Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia

title: Secluded Alila Bali Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Massages
description: Wind your way past breathtaking coastal scenery to reach Alila Manggis, a tranquil oasis tucked away on Bali's east coast near the village of Candidasa. Feel immediately soothed by the resort’s breathtaking location on a coconut grove between volcanic sands and Bali’s sacred Mount Agung, where you can indulge in a blissful treatment at Spa Alila, then continue your wellness journey with daily tai chi or yoga. In keeping with the wellness theme, healthy locally inspired bites can be devoured at Seasalt restaurant followed by an afternoon by the main swimming pool overlooking the shimmering ocean.
offer_address: Desa Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia

title: All-Inclusive Rest & Relaxation - Alila Manggis
description: Relax and rejuvenate with an all-inclusive escape to the award-winning Alila Manggis, located on Bali’s unspoiled east coast just 90-minutes from the airport. Enjoy three nights with nutritious breakfasts, lunches, afternoon tea and dinners included, plus complimentary yoga and Tai Chi classes, mini poolside massages and more for two adults.
offer_address: Desa Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia

title: Indulge in US$1,200 Worth of Five-Star Spa Treatments in Bali
description: Whether you have a girls’ holiday, babymoon or romantic escape pencilled into your diary, you won’t be able to resist indulging in US$1,200 worth of five-star spa treatments at Alila Manggis, Bali. Named one of the Top 5 Resort Hotels in Indonesia in Travel + Leisure World’s Best Awards in 2018, and Luxury Eco-Friendly Hotel of the Year 2017 by Luxury Travel Guide, this is sure to be a getaway you won’t forget. Enjoy five nights in paradise with almost unlimited massages, facials, body scrubs and manicures, amazing dining experiences, daily breakfasts, complimentary minibar, private return airport transfers and more.

title: Enjoy the Best of Both Worlds Staying in Two Beautiful Alila Properties
description: Experience the best of Bali: bliss out on the island’s serene and unspoilt east coast before dipping your toe into the glamour of stylish Seminyak, staying first at Alila Manggis and then Alila Seminyak with all private transfers included for you. Enjoy daily breakfast at both properties, authentic Balinese dining experiences including daily afternoon tea and a cooking class, indulgent massages and spa treatments - with a three-day unlimited pass at Alila Seminyak - yoga and tai chi classes and much more.
location_description: Alila Manggis with Alila Seminyak Feb 2020
offer_address: Desa Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia

title: Secluded Alila Bali Boutique Resort near Beach & Sacred Mount Agung
description: Nestled amid a verdant coconut grove on the shores of Buitan Beach, the boutique Alila Manggis resort offers a serene Bali escape combined with the signature service Alila is known for. Set between the shimmering ocean and the majestic Mount Agung - Bali's most sacred mountain - this luxurious resort boasts an idyllic location that is the perfect base from which to explore Bali’s blissfully unspoiled east coast. After a long day wandering the traditional villages and tranquil beachfront surrounding your luxurious accommodation, pamper yourself with a heavenly massage at Spa Alila, indulge in traditional Indonesian cuisine at Seasalt restaurant or unwind on one of the sunloungers lining the main swimming pool, where you can take in stunning ocean views as you soak up the sun.
offer_address: Desa Buitan, Manggis, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80871, Indonesia
